title: AI medical diagnostics race intensifies as OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic launch competing healthcare tools
summary: OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic announced specialised medical AI capabilities within days of each other this month, a clustering that suggests competitive pressure rather than coincidental timing.
content: OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic announced specialised medical AI capabilities within days of each other this month, a clustering that suggests competitive pressure rather than coincidental timing.
author: Dashveenjit Kaur

title: The AI healthcare gold rush is here
summary: AI companies are clustering around healthcare and fast. In just the past week, OpenAI bought health startup Torch, Anthropic launched Claude for healthcare, and Sam Altman-backed MergeLabs closed a $250 million seed round at an $850 million valuation.
content: AI companies are clustering around healthcare and fast. In just the past week, OpenAI bought health startup Torch, Anthropic launched Claude for healthcare, and Sam Altman-backed MergeLabs closed a $250 million seed round at an $850 million valuation.
author: Theresa Loconsolo

title: OpenAI releases a cheaper ChatGPT subscription
summary: OpenAI is expanding a low-cost subscription tier called ChatGPT Go to the US and the rest of the world. Go was released in India in August and later became available in another 170 countries prior to Friday's global release.
content: OpenAI is expanding a low-cost subscription tier called ChatGPT Go to the US and the rest of the world. Go was released in India in August and later became available in another 170 countries prior to Friday's global release.

title: OpenAI Invests in Sam Altman’s New Brain-Tech Startup Merge Labs
summary: Merge Labs has emerged from stealth with $252 million in funding from OpenAI and others. It aims to use ultrasound to read from and write to the brain.
content: Merge Labs has emerged from stealth with $252 million in funding from OpenAI and others. It aims to use ultrasound to read from and write to the brain.

summary: ChatGPT will soon start showing you sponsored products or services if they're related to your conversation. In an announcement on Friday, OpenAI says it will start testing ads in the coming weeks for logged-in users in the US who use the app for free or have a ChatGPT Go subscription.

summary: Today marks an inflection point for enterprise AI adoption. The bottleneck is not the models themselves.

title: Beyond Accuracy: A Stability-Aware Metric for Multi-Horizon Forecasting
summary: arXiv:2601.10863v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Traditional time series forecasting methods optimize for accuracy alone. This objective neglects temporal consistency, in other words, how consistently a model predicts the same future event as the forecast origin changes.
content: arXiv:2601.10863v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Traditional time series forecasting methods optimize for accuracy alone. This objective neglects temporal consistency, in other words, how consistently a model predicts the same future event as the forecast origin changes.
author: Chutian Ma, Grigorii Pomazkin, Giacinto Paolo Saggese, Paul Smith
